articles.title: Cris Collinsworth Apologizes For On-Air Comments That He Was ‘Blown Away’ By Female NFL Fans Questions During Ravens-Steelers Game - CBS Baltimore
articles.description: Longtime sports announcer Cris Collinsworth said he is "sick" over his comments on-air during the Ravens-Steelers matchup Wednesday, when he said he was "blown away" by female Steelers fans understanding football so well.
